content: Non-White will run away after you get his health bar about halfway down, but you will shortly come across him again deeper in the cave.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-White_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Non-White Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Non-White Location'.
The content is as follows:
Non-White will run away after you get his health bar about halfway down, but you will shortly come across him again deeper in the cave.
